Weleda Soothing Cleansing Lotion, Almond (2018 formulation)

Brand: Weleda

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, PRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCIS (SWEET ALMOND) OIL, GLYCERYL STEARATE SE, ALCOHOL, PRUNUS DOMESTICA SEED OIL, XANTHAN GUM, LACTIC ACID.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmenta
